snippet.title: Stronghold Legends: Steam Edition - Trailer
snippet.description:
Out Now - http://store.steampowered.com/app/40980/

Created exclusively for Steam, Stronghold Legends: Steam Edition comes with full Steam multiplayer, achievements, new maps, a digital art book, trading cards and all DLC campaigns. The Steam edition also updates Legends with full Steam Workshop support! Sculpt an icy tundra to wage war on, a scorched earth battleground using the evil terrain type or conjure up a magical kingdom fit for King Arthur himself.

Inspired by medieval folklore, Stronghold Legends: Steam Edition takes the beloved castle building series and plunges it into myth and legend with three unique factions and new Steam-exclusive content. Play as King Arthur and command his Knights of the Round Table, ally with the demonic Vlad Dracula or relive the heroic saga of Siegfried of Xanten in 24 story missions. Catapult werewolves over castle walls, incinerate troops using dragon fire or command mighty ice giants to obliterate enemy defenses! Build and destroy castles using powerful spells, mythical beasts and legendary hero units!

Like - http://bit.ly/FFfbook
Follow - http://bit.ly/ffstwitter
Subscribe - http://bit.ly/fftubesub
Stream - http://bit.ly/ffstwitch
